name: site_services
title: Our Tools
subtitle: A short description of each service

children.name: volbrain
children.title: VolBrain
children.subtitle: VolBrain Tutorial
contents: volBrain is a pipeline of processes aimed to automatically analyze MRI brain data.

children.name: ceres
children.title: CERES
children.subtitle: CERES Tutorial
contents: Ceres is a pipeline to automatically analyze Cerebellum MRI brain data.

children.name: hips
children.title: HIPS
children.subtitle: HIPS Tutorial
contents: HIPS is a pipeline for automatic hippocampus subfield segmetnation from monomodal (T1) of multimodal MRI data (T1 + T2).

children.name: lesionbrain
children.title: LesionBrain
children.subtitle: LesionBrain Tutorial
contents: LesionBrain is a pipeline to automatically segment white matter lesions from MRI data(T1 + FLAIR).
